_sText:
La position latérale de sécurité (PLS) est un geste de premiers secours à pratiquer systématiquement lorsque l’on est en présence d’une personne inconsciente, qui respire anormalement et qui est décubitus dorsal (couchée sur le dos).

The recovery position refers to one of a series of varations on a lateral recumbent or three-quarters prone position of the body, in to which an unconscious but breathing can be placed as part of first aid treatment.

tier: 6
type: linear
bonuses: 11

b1 by hork
b2 by razEr
b3 by not_a_zombie

Other thanks (beside those in endzone): FPS God for recording b4, Joshua for recording b10 and b11, bro for the informations about csgo, all from the ksf, momentum and source discord that helped me in the development of this map.

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).
